title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
Head Clerk Meadhoney revealed that a 'Stone Lord' matching Minsc's description was taken down into the vaults by the Head Banker a short time ago. The lowest level of the Counting House is protected by a great vault door. We need to enter a code to pass. We found a book of significant dwarven dates in the Head Banker's office. A certain entry was circled - 1356.

Search the Sewers for Minsc.

A cultist in the Counting House carried a note mentioning some hideout in the 'Cistern'. We should head
